text: “læa cea cng tham phwk khea thung meuxng thi khey xyu kıl thale khn thi phwk khea lameid nı wan sab ba to thangni khna thi brrda pla khxng phwk khea mayang phwk khea nı wan sab ba to khxng phwk khea nı sphaph lxytaw hı hen bn phiwna læa wan thi phwk khea mi thuxwa pen wan sab ba to nan pla hela nan ha di mayang phwk khea mi nı thanxng nan hæla rea ca thdsxb phwk khea neuxngdwy kar thi phwk khea lameid
